title: Maguire A Worthy Captain?
description:
The FC crew react to Jurgen Klopp's exclusive interview with Jurgen Klopp in which the German manager preview's next seasons goals for Liverpool and what to expect from Mo Salah after the forward signed a contract extension this offseason. Plus, the guys argue if Erik ten Hag was smart in keeping Harry Maguire on as Manchester United captain and Sebastian Salazar joins the show to talk about Wayne Rooney taking over as DC United's manager.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Exclusive Jurgen Klopp Interview on next season's expectations; Maguire to continue as Man United captain; Wayne Rooney set to join DC United as next manager
